title: Utley Should Play Monday Night
text:
Monday, October 12 2015, 05:52 PM EDT Utley Should Play Monday Night Chase Utley should be able to play for the Dodgers tonight when they take on the Mets in Game 3 of the NLDS. A source has told The Associated Press Utley's appeal hearing of his two-game suspension isn't likely to happen today, clearing the way for him to continue playing. He was suspended for a hard, break-up slide in Game 2 that broke the leg of Mets shortstop Rueben Tejada Matt Harvey starts for the Mets with the series tied at a game each. Utley is not in the Dodgers' starting lineup, but if he plays, it will be interesting to see if the Mets retaliate against him. Wilmer Flores is expected to start in Tejada's place.
